item.title: man in the helmet
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: My Return To The Heights Things really blew up when I returned to The Heights from Tahiti. Things on the island were so peaceful so I had forgotten how intense things could get on the radio. The Messenger In cancelling the apocalypse I came in contact with and experienced many other worldly beings and artifacts. This man in the helmet was a special visitor who was unable to get his message to me until 6 months later in December.
